text: Aur tum yeh halat yaad kero kay Allah Taalaa ney tum ko aad kay baad janasheen banaya aur tum ko zamin per rehney ka thikana diya kay naram zamin per mehal banatay ho aur paharon ko taraash taraash ker unn mein ghar banatay ho so Allah Taalaa ki nematon ko yaad kero aur zamin mein fasaad mat phelao
